quote.summary: Asia-Pac Financial Investment Co Ltd is an investment holding company engaged in the asset appraisal related businesses. The Company operates its business through four segments. Asset Advisory Services and Asset Appraisal segment engages in the provision of asset appraisal and asset advisory services. Corporate Services and Consultancy Services segment engages in the provision of company secretarial services, human resources management, accounting and tax services, corporate communication and marketing services, corporate governance, internal control management consultancy and other services. Financial Services segment engages in the provision of financial credit services such as personal loans and commercial loans to individuals and corporations. Media Advertising segment engages in the provision of media advertising business services through in-elevator poster frames network and liquid-crystal displays network inside elevators or lobbies of middle to high-end residential community.
